game.name: Zombie Factory Tycoon
game.description:
If you are a zombie game lover, missing out on this brand new free online game can be a big mistake for you. Zombie Factory Tycoon is a pure action-packed game that is quite different from other zombie-based games. Playing this cool zombie game will surely allow you to thrill your aggressive mood. Feel free to try it out in your spare time without much bothering about your age and gender since this game is designed for gamers of all ages!
Your fight will continue until you will finish all the zombies available in the city. Your magical hand will help you to tank all the zombies in the shortest time possible. Shoot them fast before they spot you and kill you! Your instant decision-making power will come as a savior to allow you to win this game. More and more zombies are produced in your factory as time goes by. Purchase as many new zombies as you can with the help of the money you earn. You can also use that money to upgrade the already existing zombies to make your game more interesting. 
It’s in your hand now to keep your factory going and increase the fun as long as possible. The game will continue until you keep making the production of zombies. Don’t try to waste your time anymore! Lots of fun are going to come on your way when you play this brand new zombie game in your computer, mobile phone or tablet. You can also free to invite your friends and encourage them to try out more action games on our website.
